title: Old Judge book for Sale - Sold
author: ramram

posts.post_title: Old Judge book for Sale - Sold
posts.post_content:
Copy for sale of The Photographic Baseball Cards of Goodwin & Company books (new in box).  Over 450 pages and thousands of photographs of every known Old Judge card and pose.  Covers much more as well.

Rob M.

Have one more new OJ book currently available.  

Peter (Willowgrove) and Bob (tbob) indicated that they also have a book available in new or nearly new condition.

Rob M.

Anyone have another one of these books for sale?

I just got one on ebay 2 weeks ago for $23 brand new. Sellers id is: xmehc. I've bought this book 3 different times from her and she is a great seller. I contacted her once and she sold me one directly for $30 ppd. Give it a shot, who knows?
